This game could be so good but that's a big COULD. And I say that because 8/10 games you get to play with or versus at least one hacker and I know what I'm saying because I've played this game for like 6-7 years now but I quit because of the cheaters. And the worse part is that Valve reaaally doesn't give a crap on making a better anti-hack system, they care only about the stupid money when they release a new case or new skins and that's bullshit in my opinion. I'd rate this game a solid 6/10.
